Description:
Detect Attempt PrintNightmare (CVE-2021-1675) Remote code execution in Windows Spooler Service

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), KevTheHermit, fuzzyf10w
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Rejected SMB Guest Logon From IP
Query: sourcetype='windows-smbclient-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '31017' and username = '' and servername like '\1%'
